nodes.text: A Forward Air Controller, sometimes referred to as FAC, was an individual who directed air support to targets during a battle. The most notable individual who did this was Cait, who was killed directing X-wing starfighters to their targets during the fighting on Allst Prime.
The position of Forward Air Controller first appeared in the 2015 short story "Inbrief," written by Janine K. Spendlove and illustrated by Jose Cabrera.
